channel.title: Need a TUT or code to make new update warning
channel.description:
I been on a p server that does this.. Its when u see on the side window saying new update in: 30 seconds... ect.
Need code for that. Thank You Very Much

item.title: Need a TUT or code to make new update warning
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“Revolation, post:1, topic:104392”]I been on a p server that does this… Its when u see on the side window saying new update in: 30 seconds… ect.

Need code for that. Thank You Very Much[/quote]

thats very simple

type ::update 30

the time is in seconds only so say you want it to be 2 mins… make it ::update 120 =] hope this helps you even the slitest bit

metal

Read full topic
item.source: Need a TUT or code to make new update warning
